cards.html:
We’ve heard rumblings of Mario being in Wreck-it Ralph 2, but now it’s confirmed as Charles Martinet will indeed be doing the voice acting for our favorite plumber.

This all comes to us from the official IMDB listing of Wreck-it Ralph 2, as Martinet himself is listed among the cast.

What do you take from this recent news? Let us know in the comment section below.

Be sure to like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter @switchaboo for more on Nintendo Switch. And hey, why not check out the rest of our Nintendo E3 predictions?
